results.title: This Ain't California
results.creator_credit: Wildfremd Production, ARTE, MDR, RBB, Marten Persiel, Ira Wedel and Simone Eichhorn
results.brief_description: A retrospective look at the youth cultures born in the German Democratic Republic. A celebration of the lust for life, a contemporary trip into the world of skate, a tale on three heroes and their boards, from their childhood in the seventies, through their teenage rebellion in the eighties and the summer of 1989, when their life changed forever, to 2011.

constellations_other.name: Skate or die
constellations_other.description: Skateboarding is a subculture frequently documented, from amateur skate videos filmed with fish-eye lenses, to documentaries exploring the genesis of the subculture and gritty feature films depicting underlying social dynamics.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Wildfremd Production, ARTE, MDR, RBB, Marten Persiel, Ira Wedel and Simone Eichhorn
results.description: A retrospective look at the youth cultures born in the German Democratic Republic. A celebration of the lust for life, a contemporary trip into the world of skate, a tale on three heroes and their boards, from their childhood in the seventies, through their teenage rebellion in the eighties and the summer of 1989, when their life changed forever, to 2011.

results.title: They Shall Not Grow Old
results.brief_description: A documentary about World War I with never-before-seen footage to commemorate the centennial of Armistice Day, and the end of the war.

constellations_other.name: Communicating colour
constellations_other.description: An exploration of colour on-screen inspired by Technicolor supervisor, Natalie Kalmus.

results.description: A documentary about World War I with never-before-seen footage to commemorate the centennial of Armistice Day, and the end of the war.
description_for_label: A documentary about World War I with never-before-seen footage to commemorate the centennial of Armistice Day, and the end of the war.

results.title: Theodore Rex
results.brief_description: In an alternate futuristic society, a tough female police detective is paired with a talking dinosaur to find the killer of dinosaurs and other prehistoric animals leading them to a mad scientist bent on creating a new Armageddon.

constellations_other.name: Love of the Glove
constellations_other.description: Looking at the Powerglove's influence on film and television.

results.description: In an alternate futuristic society, a tough female police detective is paired with a talking dinosaur to find the killer of dinosaurs and other prehistoric animals leading them to a mad scientist bent on creating a new Armageddon.
description_for_label: In an alternate futuristic society, a tough female police detective is paired with a talking dinosaur to find the killer of dinosaurs and other prehistoric animals leading them to a mad scientist bent on creating a new Armageddon.

results.title: Their Finest
results.creator_credit: Lone Scherfig, Stephen Woolley, Alice Normington, Amanda Posey, Finola Dwyer, Charlotte Walter, Gaby Chiappe, Elizabeth Karlsen, BBC Films, HanWay Films, Number 9 Films, Filmgate Films, Ripken Productions, Pinewood Pictures, Wildgaze Films and Film i Väst
results.brief_description: During the Blitz of World War II, a female screenwriter (Gemma Arterton) works on a film celebrating England’s resilience as a way to buoy a weary populace’s spirits. Her efforts to dramatise the true story of two sisters (Lily Knight and Francesca Knight) who undertook their own maritime mission to rescue wounded soldiers are met with mixed feelings by a dismissive all-male staff.

constellations_other.name: The war effort on film
constellations_other.description: Newsreel and documentaries were used as propaganda for the war effort by all sides during WWII, many of them made by major film studios, directors and actors.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Lone Scherfig, Stephen Woolley, Alice Normington, Amanda Posey, Finola Dwyer, Charlotte Walter, Gaby Chiappe, Elizabeth Karlsen, BBC Films, HanWay Films, Number 9 Films, Filmgate Films, Ripken Productions, Pinewood Pictures, Wildgaze Films and Film i Väst

results.title: Theater of War
results.brief_description: A behind-the-scenes look at The Public Theater’s production of Bertolt Brecht’s “Mother Courage” that examines the playwright’s life and ideas.
results.description: A behind-the-scenes look at The Public Theater’s production of Bertolt Brecht’s “Mother Courage” that examines the playwright’s life and ideas.
description_for_label: A behind-the-scenes look at The Public Theater’s production of Bertolt Brecht’s “Mother Courage” that examines the playwright’s life and ideas.

results.title: The Woman in Black
results.brief_description: Young lawyer Arthur Kipps travels to a remote village to organise a recently deceased client’s estate, where he uncovers tragic secrets and glimpses a mysterious woman in black.

constellations_other.name: Optical toys, Totoro and terrors
constellations_other.description: Victorian-era optical toys have inspired the biggest animation studios and the scariest horror films.

results.description: The story follows a young lawyer, Arthur Kipps, who is ordered to travel to a remote village and sort out a recently deceased client’s papers. As he works alone in the client’s isolated house, Kipps begins to uncover tragic secrets, his unease growing when he glimpses a mysterious woman dressed only in black.
description_for_label: The story follows a young lawyer, Arthur Kipps, who is ordered to travel to a remote village and sort out a recently deceased client’s papers. As he works alone in the client’s isolated house, Kipps begins to uncover tragic secrets, his unease growing when he glimpses a mysterious woman dressed only in black.

results.title: The Wolf Man
results.brief_description: Ancient curses, fortune tellers and one of the most iconic movie monsters ever feature in Universal Pictures’ The Wolfman. After Larry Talbot (Lon Chaney Jr) returns home for his brother’s funeral, he’s bitten by a werewolf and transforms into a creature of the night.

constellations_other.name: Transformations
constellations_other.description: Like many techniques born from the visual language of magic lanterns, the dissolve effect was incorporated into filmmaking and is still used today.

results.description: Ancient curses, fortune tellers and one of the most iconic movie monsters ever feature in Universal Pictures’ The Wolfman. After Larry Talbot (Lon Chaney Jr) returns home for his brother’s funeral, he’s bitten by a werewolf and transforms into a creature of the night. Lon Chaney Jr.’s turn as the werewolf has been hugely influential on Hollywood representations of the legendary monster, though it is actually the second Universal Pictures werewolf film. Six years earlier the less successful Werewolf of London was released in 1935.
description_for_label: Ancient curses, fortune tellers and one of the most iconic movie monsters ever feature in Universal Pictures’ The Wolfman. After Larry Talbot (Lon Chaney Jr) returns home for his brother’s funeral, he’s bitten by a werewolf and transforms into a creature of the night. Lon Chaney Jr.’s turn as the werewolf has been hugely influential on Hollywood representations of the legendary monster, though it is actually the second Universal Pictures werewolf film. Six years earlier the less successful Werewolf of London was released in 1935.

results.title: The Wizard of Oz
results.brief_description: When a tornado rips through Kansas, Dorothy (Judy Garland) and her dog, Toto, are whisked away in their house to the magical land of Oz. They follow the Yellow Brick Road toward the Emerald City to meet the Wizard, and encounter a Scarecrow, a Tin Man and a Cowardly Lion.

constellations_other.name: Over the Technicolor rainbow
constellations_other.description: This Constellation explores the beginning and legacy of Technicolor and was created by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies students Adam Virgona and Kristian Vass.

constellations_other.name: Communicating colour
constellations_other.description: An exploration of colour on-screen inspired by Technicolor supervisor, Natalie Kalmus.

constellations_other.name: Colour and creativity
constellations_other.description: From dying film to Technicolor and beyond, creative applications of colour have been part of cinema since its inception.

constellations_other.name: Dragon's Lair
constellations_other.description: A look at pop-cultural interconnections that spawn from the lair of Don Bluth's arcade classic.

results.description: Young Dorothy finds herself in a magical world where she makes friends with a lion, a scarecrow and a tin man as they make their way along the yellow brick road to talk with the Wizard and ask for the things they miss most in their lives. The Wicked Witch of the West is the only thing that could stop them.
description_for_label: Young Dorothy finds herself in a magical world where she makes friends with a lion, a scarecrow and a tin man as they make their way along the yellow brick road to talk with the Wizard and ask for the things they miss most in their lives. The Wicked Witch of the West is the only thing that could stop them.

results.title: The Wizard
results.brief_description: Corey refuses to let his younger brother Jimmy be institutionalised, and the two run away together. They soon join forces with a resourceful girl, who notices that Jimmy has a special talent: he can achieve the high score on absolutely every videogame he plays.

constellations_other.name: Love of the Glove
constellations_other.description: Looking at the Powerglove's influence on film and television.

results.description: Corey refuses to let his emotionally disturbed younger brother Jimmy be institutionalized, and the two run away together. They soon join forces with a resourceful girl, who notices that Jimmy has a special talent: he is a “wizard” at video games and can achieve the high score on absolutely everything he plays. Evading their parents and a sinister bounty hunter, the trio head for a climactic showdown at the national video game championships in California.
description_for_label: Corey refuses to let his emotionally disturbed younger brother Jimmy be institutionalized, and the two run away together. They soon join forces with a resourceful girl, who notices that Jimmy has a special talent: he is a “wizard” at video games and can achieve the high score on absolutely everything he plays. Evading their parents and a sinister bounty hunter, the trio head for a climactic showdown at the national video game championships in California.

results.title: The Wiz
results.brief_description: A Thanksgiving dinner brings a host of family together in a Harlem apartment, where a 24-year-old schoolteacher named Dorothy Gale (Diana Ross) lives with her Aunt Em (Theresa Merritt) and Uncle Henry (Stanley Greene). Extremely introverted, she has, as Aunt Em teases her, “never been south of 125th Street”, and refuses to move out and on with her life.

constellations_other.name: Dragon's Lair
constellations_other.description: A look at pop-cultural interconnections that spawn from the lair of Don Bluth's arcade classic.
